<p>热点随笔：</p>

href="https://www.cnblogs.com/CareySon/archive/2025/03/20/why_avoid_er_or_suffixes_in_object_naming.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">对象命名为何需要避免'-er'和'-or'后缀</a>&nbsp;(<a
